        public DateHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static Date add(Date date,
                       int diff,
                       TimeUnit unit)
        Adds the specified amount of time to the given date.
        Parameters:
        date - to be added
        diff - time difference (numeric), to be paired with unit
        unit - TimeUnit
        Returns:
        new instance of Date with the added amount of time difference if the base date is not null, otherwise returns null

      • minus

        public static Date minus(Date date,
                         int diff,
                         TimeUnit unit)
        Subtracts the specified amount of time from the given date.
        Parameters:
        date - to be subtracted
        diff - time difference (numeric), to be paired with unit
        unit - TimeUnit
        Returns:
        new instance of Date with the subtracted amount of time difference if the base date is not null, otherwise returns null

      • is

        public static boolean is(Date firstDate,
                         TimeComparator comparator,
                         Date secondDate)
        Evaluates whether firstDate satisfies comparator when compared to secondDate.
        Parameters:
        firstDate - of type Date
        comparator - of type TimeComparator
        secondDate - of type Date
        Returns:
        true if firstDate satisfies comparator when compared to secondDate.
        Returns false if one of the following is true:
        • Both firstDate and secondDate are null and TimeComparator.EQUAL_TO is not used
        • Both firstDate and secondDate are null and TimeComparator.NOT_EQUAL_TO is used
        • Both firstDate and secondDate are not null and TimeComparator.NOT_EQUAL_TO is used
        • Either firstDate or secondDate is null
        • comparator is null
        • firstDate does not satisfy comparator when compared to secondDate

      • now

        public static Date now()
        Syntax sugar. Returns new Date.
        Returns:
        new Date

      • now

        public static String now(String pattern)
        Returns string representation of the current time according to the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - must conform to the specifications of DateTimeFormat
        Returns:
        string representation of the current time
        See Also:
        now(), DateTimeFormat

      • toDate

        public static Date toDate(String str,
                          String pattern)
        Parses the given str using pattern to an instance of Date.
        Parameters:
        str - to be parsed
        pattern - must conform to the specifications of DateTimeFormat. Common patterns can be found in CommonDateTimePatterns.
        Returns:
        new instance of Date with the parsed value if neither str nor pattern is blank, otherwise returns null

      • toString

        public static String toString(Date date,
                              String pattern)
        Returns string representation of the given date and formats it according to the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        date - to be converted to String
        pattern - must conform to the specifications of DateTimeFormat. Common patterns can be found in CommonDateTimePatterns.
        Returns:
        string representation of the given date. Never returns null.

      • toMilliseconds

        public static long toMilliseconds(long input,
                                  TimeUnit unit)
        Converts input to milliseconds with respect to the given unit.
        Parameters:
        input - time, paired with unit
        unit - of type TimeUnit. Passing null will return the input itself, without converting it into milliseconds
        Returns:
        milliseconds value of input.
